mapper.select: select m.name, c.user_id, c.title,c.reg_date,c.board_status,c.site_name from (select check_board.user_id, check_board.title, substr(check_board.reg_date,0,14) as reg_date, check_board.board_status,check_board.site_id, site.site_name from check_board,site where check_board.site_id = site.site_id) c,member m where c.user_id = m.user_id and m.user_id = #{user_id}
select password from MEMBER where user_id = #{user_id}
